channel.title: Non teleto owner

item.title: Non teleto owner
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteleto")) { String name = playerCommand.substring(8); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { if (!name.equalsIgnoreCase("owner")) { c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players.getX(), Server.playerHandler.players.getY(), Server.playerHandler.players.heightLevel); } } } } }i have no clue if that will work or not

im not into servers much anymore

@uncalled; that appends to the player using the command
@drub; that has ‘variable not found’ error.[/quote]
Wouldn’t it be better to just check player rights, I believe he wants it so all owners can teleport?

item.title: Non teleto owner
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:3, topic:395707”][quote author=scenemo link=topic=492902.msg3603524#msg3603524 date=1305850423]
how would i make this command not let a mod tele to an owner or a certain name?

[QUOTE] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“xteleto”)) {
String name = playerCommand.substring(8);
for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].heightLevel);
}
}
}
}[/QUOTE]
[/quote]

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteleto") && (playerRights >= 3)) { String name = playerCommand.substring(8); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].heightLevel); } } } }[/quote]Not what he’s asking:

scenemo:

how would i make this command not let a mod tele to an owner or a certain name?

Read full topic

item.title: Non teleto owner
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“scenemo, post:1, topic:395707”]how would i make this command not let a mod tele to an owner or a certain name?

[QUOTE] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“xteleto”)) {
String name = playerCommand.substring(8);
for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].heightLevel);
}
}
}
}[/QUOTE][/quote]

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteleto") && (playerRights >= 3)) { String name = playerCommand.substring(8); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].heightLevel); } } } }
Wait, i misunderstood you, you mean it can be for mod plus but they cant teleport to owners?

Read full topic

item.title: Non teleto owner
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Might work, haven’t tested:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteleto")) { String name = playerCommand.substring(8); if (!c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name") { for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players.getX(), Server.playerHandler.players.getY(), Server.playerHandler.players.heightLevel); } else { c.sendMessage("You cannot teleport to this person!"); } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Non teleto owner
item.dc:creator: @scenemo scenemo
item.description:
@scenemo wrote:

how would i make this command not let a mod tele to an owner or a certain name?

[QUOTE] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“xteleto”)) {
String name = playerCommand.substring(8);
for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].heightLevel);
}
}
}
}[/QUOTE]
